body_html: Also, it looks like my feature request was already partly implemented in the master branch. However, the train_and_evaluate function was not using the saving_listeners parameter that was added to the constructor, so that's the gist of my addition there.
body_text: Also, it looks like my feature request was already partly implemented in the master branch. However, the train_and_evaluate function was not using the saving_listeners parameter that was added to the constructor, so that's the gist of my addition there.
body: Also, it looks like my feature request was already partly implemented in the master branch. However, the `train_and_evaluate` function was not using the `saving_listeners` parameter that was added to the constructor, so that's the gist of my addition there.
